concept.title: Use Plot Styles
concept.shortdesc: ZWCAD uses plot styles to change the appearance of your printed drawing without modifying the actual objects in your drawing. Assigning plot styles allows you to customize the Color, GrayScale, Screening, and Lineweight that are used to print your drawing. Plot styles help you control what your drawing looks like when it is printed.

conbody.p: Because plot styles are saved in plot style tables, which are files located on your computer, disk, or server, you can reuse them to help eliminate the need to reconfigure your print settings each time you print a drawing. You can save plot styles in a named file for each of your clients. You can even share the file with coworkers, or store the files on a network to ensure that everyone in your office uses the same standards.
